panels.description:
This panel shows the earning during the last hour, and the annualized % of the hourly earning.

Those data won't be shown until the first validator is at least one hour old, or that you started prometheus at least one hour ago.

Also, the annualized % might be wrong if you have downtime while new validators are getting validated
panels.title: Hourly earning

panels.description: Current price of ETH in USD.
panels.title: ETH$

panels.description: The mathematical expectation of time between proposals for an individual validator and across all local validators.
Latest base fee per gas. Full support: Besu, Erigon, Geth, Nethermind
panels.title: Base Fee per Gas

panels.description: The percentage of the gas limit used.
panels.title: Gas Used

panels.description: Current count of consensus and execution client peers. Full support: Besu, Erigon, Geth, Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nethermind, Nimbus, Prysm, Teku
panels.title: Peer Count

panels.description:
This panel shows the earning during the last day, and the annualized % of the daily earning.

Those data won't be shown until the first validator is at least one day old, or that you started prometheus at least one day ago.

Also, the annualized % might be wrong if you have downtime while new validators are getting validated
panels.title: Daily earning

panels.description: Sum of the current balance of all local validators

targets.expr:
sum by (group,network) (validator_balance{group="Prysm/Reth",job="prysm-validator"}) or
sum by (group,network) (consensus_validator_balance:ETH{group="Prysm/Reth Group"})

panels.title: ETH Balance

panels.description: Number of transactions, voluntary exits, attester slashings, and proposer slashing in the head block. Full support: Ethereum Metrics Exporter. Limited support: Besu.
panels.title: Head Block

panels.description: List of local validators and their scheduled attestations/proposals, and the amount of time remaining until those slots. Time remaining is as of the last Grafana data refresh. Full support: Prysm
panels.title: Upcoming Validator Duties

panels.description: Displays the current slot and the slot number for the next scheduled attestation across all local validators. Also displays the amount of time remaining until that slot. Time remaining is as of the last Grafana data refresh. Full support: Prysm

targets.expr: min by (group,network,explorer) (max by (group,network,pubkey,explorer) (validator_next_attestation_slot{group="Prysm/Reth"} > scalar(floor((time() - last_over_time(consensus_beacon_genesis_time{group="Prysm/Reth"}[2h]))/12)))) * 12 + scalar(max by (group,network,explorer) (last_over_time(consensus_beacon_genesis_time{group="Prysm/Reth"}[2h])) -  time())

panels.title: Next Attestation

panels.description: This panel will count only the votes done since your validator process started
panels.title: Validator vote summary

panels.description: Displays the current slot and the slot number for the next scheduled proposal across all local validators. Also displays the amount of time remaining until that slot. Time remaining is as of the last Grafana data refresh. Full support: Prysm

targets.expr: min by (group,network,explorer) (max by (group,network,pubkey) (validator_next_proposal_slot{group="Prysm/Reth"} > scalar(floor((time() - last_over_time(consensus_beacon_genesis_time{group="Prysm/Reth"}[2h]))/12)))) or on() vector(-1)

min by (group,network,explorer) (max by (group,network,pubkey) (validator_next_proposal_slot{group="Prysm/Reth"} > scalar(floor((time() - last_over_time(consensus_beacon_genesis_time{group="Prysm/Reth"}[2h]))/12)))) * 12 + scalar(max by (group,network) (last_over_time(consensus_beacon_genesis_time{group="Goerli Prysm/Reth"}[2h])) - time())

panels.title: Next Proposal

panels.description:
This graph is made for trading purpose mostly.
Supposing that if a lot of validators are exiting, price is gonna dump.

Also this can prevent to exit while exiting queue is too long, same for depositing while pending queue is too long.
panels.title: Balance validators status and participation rate

panels.description: This panel won't have consistant values during the first hour of the node started process
panels.title: Hourly Logs

panels.description: Software client details, including version, latest release, uptime, and database size. Full support: Erigon,  Lighthouse, Prysm. Partial support: Besu, Ethereum Metrics Exporter, Geth, Lodestar, Nethermind, Nimbus, Teku

targets.expr:
(
topk by (service) (1,version{group="Prysm/Reth"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,lighthouse_info{group="Prysm/Reth"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,prysm_version{group="Prysm/Reth"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,beacon_teku_version{group="Prysm/Reth"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,execution_version{group="Prysm/Reth"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,prometheus_build_info{group="Prysm/Reth"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,lodestar_version{group="Prysm/Reth"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,blackbox_exporter_build_info{group="Prysm/Reth"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,node_exporter_build_info{group="Prysm/Reth"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,dirk_release{group="Prysm/Reth"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,vouch_release{group="Prysm/Reth"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,process_start_time_seconds{group="Prysm/Reth"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,eth_exe_web3_client_version{group="Prysm/Reth"}) or
on(service) topk by (service) (1,eth_con_node_version{group="Prysm/Reth"})
) * on(client) group_left(tag_name,html_url) topk by (client) (1,last_over_time(release_id{client!=""}[2h]))

sum by (service) (bcnode_disk_beaconchain_bytes_total{group="Prysm/Reth"}) or
sum by (service) (eth_db_chaindata_disk_size{group="Prysm/Reth"} + eth_db_chaindata_ancient_size{group="Prysm/Reth"}) or
sum by (service) (db_size{group="Prysm/Reth"}) or
sum by (service) (store_disk_db_size{group="Prysm/Reth"})

panels.title: Software:

alert.message: NODE ALERT: MORE THAN 50 SLOTS BEHIND THAN THE CHAIN
alert.name: NODE: 50 slots behind

alert.message: NETWORK ALERT: THE PARTICIPATION RATE IS BELOW 75%! You won't get any reward until the participation rate rise up above 75% again. This alert doesn't require any action from you
alert.name: NETWORK: Participation rate below 75%

panels.description: Number of CPU seconds used by client software per minute. Full support: Besu, blackbox_exporter, Erigon, Ethereum Metrics Exporter, json_exporter, Lighthouse, Lodestar, Nethermind, Nimbus, node_exporter, Prometheus, Prysm, Teku. No support: Geth
panels.title: Process CPU Seconds (per minute)

alert.message: VALIDATOR ALERT: THE EARNING IN THE LAST HOUR IS LESS THAN 0
alert.name: VALIDATOR: Hourly earning <= 0
